title: Fireside with the Underboss - Sammy "The_Babysitter"
description: This is one story that have you laughing through it all. During his time as a Ramper, Sammy starts an unconventional relationship with a married woman named Marie. Sammy tells the how the relationship falls apart after she asks him to babysit.
itunes:author: Sammy "The Bull" Gravano
itunes:subtitle: This is one story that have you laughing through it all. During his time as a Ramper, Sammy starts an unconventional relationship with a married woman named Marie. Sammy tells the how the relationship falls apart after she asks him to babysit.
